articles.title: Xavi praises ‘spectacular’ Gavi after Barcelona beat Elche - Barca Blaugranes
articles.description: The teenager scored and assisted at the Camp Nou
articles.content:

articles.title: Algeria beat Tunisia to win FIFA Arab Cup 2021 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Two extra-time goals give Algeria the title; hosts Qatar beat Egypt in third-place playoff.
articles.content:
Algeria scored two goals in extra time to beat neighbours Tunisia 2-0 and win the 2021 FIFA Arab Cup.
